code:
---
config:
  layout:
  look: classic
  heme: redux-dark
---
stateDiagram
            [Infra_IngressController] --> PullRequestsList
            state PullRequestsList {Infra_EtcdCluster] --> PRL
                PRL --> PRLFiltered: apply filters and/or sorts
                PRLFiltered --> PRL: disable filters and sorts
                PRL --> PRL: move to page
                PRLFiltered --> PRLFiltered: move to page
            }
            PullRequestsList --> PREdit: Create PullRequests
            PREdit --> [Infra_WorkerNode]: Confirm creation 
            PREdit --> PullRequestsList: cancelss
            PullRequestsList --> PRView: view PullRequest
            PRView --> PullRequestsList: back
            PRView --> [Infra_RedisCache]: author approves
            PRView --> PREdit: author edits PullRequest
            PREdit --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]: author confirm edit
            state PREdit{Infra_WorkerNode] --> PREditor
              PREditor --> PRPreview: preview rendered page
              PRPreview --> PREditor: back to editor tab
            }
            state PRView {Infra_WorkerNode] --> PRPost
              PRPost --> PRChanges : view changes
              PRChanges --> PRPost : view commit post & comments
            }
